alert.note: Alert for Laramie Valley (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 26 at 7:11PM MST until February 27 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH 8 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 MPH with gusts up to 60 MPH possible. * WHERE...In Nebraska, Banner County, Kimball County and Cheyenne County. In Wyoming, the Laramie Valley. * WHEN...Through 8 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight or high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
